summary: This is an internal email dated August 10, 2019, regarding an update on suicide watch and psychological observation status for an inmate, with a note about pending bedspace in the Special Housing Unit (SHU). The document is marked confidential and appears to be related to inmate monitoring procedures.

events.title: Suicide Watch and Psych Observation Update
events.description: An internal update was sent regarding the status of suicide watch and psychological observation for an inmate, noting pending bedspace in the Special Housing Unit.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email dated August 10, 2019, concerning inmate monitoring.
It provides an update on suicide watch and psychological observation status.
It notes pending bedspace in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
The document is marked confidential and is part of the SDNY Epstein case files.
